BitField.name: ENABLE
BitField.description: UART enabled, to enable UART block, it is used to drive a gated clock in order to save power consumption when UART is not used. FIFOs are flushed when UART is disabled.

Enum.name: dis
Enum.description: UART disabled. FIFOs are flushed. Clock is gated off for power savings.

BitField.name: PARITY_EN
BitField.description: Enable/disable Parity bit (9th character).

BitField.name: PARITY
BitField.description: When PARITY_EN=1, selects odd, even, Mark or Space parity. Mark parity = always 1; Space parity = always 0.

BitField.name: PARMD
BitField.description: Selects parity based on 1s or 0s count (when PARITY_EN=1).

Enum.description: Parity calculation is based on number of 1s in frame.
Parity calculation is based on number of 0s in frame.

BitField.name: TX_FLUSH
BitField.description: Flushes the TX FIFO buffer.

BitField.name: RX_FLUSH
BitField.description: Flushes the RX FIFO buffer.

BitField.name: BITACC
BitField.description: If set, bit accuracy is selected, in this case the bit duration is the same for all the bits with the optimal accuracy. But the frame duration can have a significant deviation from the expected baudrate.If clear, frame accuracy is selected, therefore bits can have different duration in order to guarantee the minimum frame deviation.

BitField.name: CHAR_SIZE
BitField.description: Selects UART character size.

BitField.name: STOPBITS
BitField.description: Selects the number of stop bits that will be generated.

BitField.name: FLOW_CTRL
BitField.description: Enables/disables hardware flow control.

Enum.name: en
Enum.description: HW Flow Control with RTS/CTS enabled

BitField.name: FLOW_POL
BitField.description: RTS/CTS polarity.

BitField.name: NULL_MODEM
BitField.description: NULL Modem Support (RTS/CTS and TXD/RXD swap).

BitField.name: BREAK
BitField.description: Break control bit. It causes a break condition to be transmitted to receiving UART.

Enum.name: EN
Enum.description: Break characters are sent(all the bits are at '0' including start/parity/stop).

BitField.name: CLKSEL
BitField.description: Baud Rate Clock Source Select. Selects the baud rate clock.

Enum.name: ALTERNATE
Enum.description: Alternate 7.3727MHz internal clock. Useful in low power modes when the system clock is slow.

BitField.name: RX_TO
BitField.description: RX Time Out. RX time out interrupt will occur after RXTO Uart characters if RX-FIFO is not empty and RX FIFO has not been read.

BitField.name: RX_FIFO_THRESH
BitField.description: RX FIFO Threshold Level.When the RX FIFO reaches this many bytes or higher, UARTn_INFTL.rx_fifo_level is set.

BitField.name: TX_FIFO_THRESH
BitField.description: TX FIFO Threshold Level. When the TX FIFO reaches this many bytes or higher, UARTn_INTFL.tx_fifo_level is set.

BitField.name: RTS_FIFO_THRESH
BitField.description: RTS threshold control. When the RX FIFO reaches this many bytes or higher, the RTS output signal is deasserted, informing the transmitting UART to stop sending data to this UART.

BitField.name: TX_BUSY
BitField.description: Read-only flag indicating the UART transmit status.

BitField.name: RX_BUSY
BitField.description: Read-only flag indicating the UARTreceiver status.

BitField.name: PARITY
BitField.description: 9th Received bit state. This bit identifies the state of the 9th bit of received data. Only available for UART_CTRL.SIZE[1:0]=3.

BitField.name: BREAK
BitField.description: Received BREAK status. BREAKS is cleared when UART_STAT register is read. Received data input is held in spacing (logic 0) state for longer than a full word transmission time (that is, the total time of Start bit + data bits + Parity + Stop bits).

BitField.name: RX_EMPTY

BitField.description: Read-only flag indicating the RX FIFO state.

BitField.description: Enable for interrupt when TX FIFO reaches the number of bytes configured by the TXTHD field.

BitField.name: IBAUD
BitField.description: Integer portion of baud rate divisor value. IBAUD = InputClock / (factor * Baud Rate Frequency).

BitField.name: FACTOR
BitField.description: FACTOR must be chosen to have IDIV>0. factor used in calculation = 128 >> FACTOR.

BitField.name: DBAUD
BitField.description: Decimal portion of baud rate divisor value. DIV = InputClock/(factor*Baud Rate Frequency). DDIV=(DIV-IDIV)*128.

BitField.name: FIFO
BitField.description: Load/unload location for TX and RX FIFO buffers.

BitField.name: TDMA_EN
BitField.description: TX DMA channel enable.

BitField.name: RXDMA_EN
BitField.description: RX DMA channel enable.

BitField.name: TXDMA_LEVEL
BitField.description: TX threshold for DMA transmission.

BitField.name: RXDMA_LEVEL
BitField.description: RX threshold for DMA transmission.

BitField.name: DATA
BitField.description: Reading from this field returns the next character available at the output of the TX FIFO (if one is available, otherwise 00h is returned).

BitField.name: ENABLE
BitField.description: UART enabled, to enable UART block, it is used to drive a gated clock in order to save power consumption when UART is not used. FIFOs are flushed when UART is disabled.

Enum.name: dis
Enum.description: UART disabled. FIFOs are flushed. Clock is gated off for power savings.

BitField.name: PARITY_EN
BitField.description: Enable/disable Parity bit (9th character).

BitField.name: PARITY
BitField.description: When PARITY_EN=1, selects odd, even, Mark or Space parity. Mark parity = always 1; Space parity = always 0.

BitField.name: PARMD
BitField.description: Selects parity based on 1s or 0s count (when PARITY_EN=1).

Enum.description: Parity calculation is based on number of 1s in frame.
Parity calculation is based on number of 0s in frame.

BitField.name: TX_FLUSH
BitField.description: Flushes the TX FIFO buffer.

BitField.name: RX_FLUSH
BitField.description: Flushes the RX FIFO buffer.

BitField.name: BITACC
BitField.description: If set, bit accuracy is selected, in this case the bit duration is the same for all the bits with the optimal accuracy. But the frame duration can have a significant deviation from the expected baudrate.If clear, frame accuracy is selected, therefore bits can have different duration in order to guarantee the minimum frame deviation.

BitField.name: CHAR_SIZE
BitField.description: Selects UART character size.

BitField.name: STOPBITS
BitField.description: Selects the number of stop bits that will be generated.

BitField.name: FLOW_CTRL
BitField.description: Enables/disables hardware flow control.

Enum.name: en
Enum.description: HW Flow Control with RTS/CTS enabled

BitField.name: FLOW_POL
BitField.description: RTS/CTS polarity.

BitField.name: NULL_MODEM
BitField.description: NULL Modem Support (RTS/CTS and TXD/RXD swap).

BitField.name: BREAK
BitField.description: Break control bit. It causes a break condition to be transmitted to receiving UART.

Enum.name: EN
Enum.description: Break characters are sent(all the bits are at '0' including start/parity/stop).

BitField.name: CLKSEL
BitField.description: Baud Rate Clock Source Select. Selects the baud rate clock.

Enum.name: ALTERNATE
Enum.description: Alternate 7.3727MHz internal clock. Useful in low power modes when the system clock is slow.

BitField.name: RX_TO
BitField.description: RX Time Out. RX time out interrupt will occur after RXTO Uart characters if RX-FIFO is not empty and RX FIFO has not been read.

BitField.name: RX_FIFO_THRESH
BitField.description: RX FIFO Threshold Level.When the RX FIFO reaches this many bytes or higher, UARTn_INFTL.rx_fifo_level is set.

BitField.name: TX_FIFO_THRESH
BitField.description: TX FIFO Threshold Level. When the TX FIFO reaches this many bytes or higher, UARTn_INTFL.tx_fifo_level is set.

BitField.name: RTS_FIFO_THRESH
BitField.description: RTS threshold control. When the RX FIFO reaches this many bytes or higher, the RTS output signal is deasserted, informing the transmitting UART to stop sending data to this UART.

BitField.name: TX_BUSY
BitField.description: Read-only flag indicating the UART transmit status.

BitField.name: RX_BUSY
BitField.description: Read-only flag indicating the UARTreceiver status.

BitField.name: PARITY
BitField.description: 9th Received bit state. This bit identifies the state of the 9th bit of received data. Only available for UART_CTRL.SIZE[1:0]=3.

BitField.description: Received BREAK status. BREAKS is cleared when UART_STAT register is read. Received data input is held in spacing (logic 0) state for longer than a full word transmission time (that is, the total time of Start bit + data bits + Parity + Stop bits).

BitField.description: Integer portion of baud rate divisor value. IBAUD = InputClock / (factor * Baud Rate Frequency).

BitField.name: INT_PERIOD
BitField.description: Watchdog Interrupt Period. The watchdog timer will assert an interrupt, if enabled, if the CPU does not write the watchdog reset sequence to the WDT_RST register before the watchdog timer has counted this time period since the last timer reset.

BitField.name: RST_PERIOD
BitField.description: Watchdog Reset Period. The watchdog timer will assert a reset, if enabled, if the CPU does not write the watchdog reset sequence to the WDT_RST register before the watchdog timer has counted this time period since the last timer reset.

BitField.name: WDT_EN
BitField.description: Watchdog Timer Enable.

BitField.name: INT_FLAG
BitField.description: Watchdog Timer Interrupt Flag.

BitField.name: INT_EN
BitField.description: Watchdog Timer Interrupt Enable.

BitField.name: RST_EN
BitField.description: Watchdog Timer Reset Enable.

BitField.name: RST_FLAG
BitField.description: Watchdog Timer Reset Flag.

BitField.name: WDT_RST
BitField.description: Writing the watchdog counter 'reset sequence' to this register resets the watchdog counter. If the watchdog count exceeds INT_PERIOD then a watchdog interrupt will occur, if enabled. If the watchdog count exceeds RST_PERIOD then a watchdog reset will occur, if enabled.

Enum.name: seq0
Enum.description: The first value to be written to reset the WDT.

Enum.name: seq1
Enum.description: The second value to be written to reset the WDT.
